summary.span: Represents an ordered collection of values.

span.span: Represents an ordered collection of values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別的成員所述完全行為， ，和文件，不同之處在於此實作會擲回如果您嘗試插入`null`至集合。Members of this class behave exactly as described by the , , and documentation, except that this implementation throws an if you attempt to insert `null` into the collection. **可凍結的功能：** 因為它繼承自類別類別提供數個特殊功能：可以宣告物件，因為在多個物件，變成唯讀，以改善之間共用效能考量，複製，而且進行安全執行緒。**Freezable Features:** Because it inherits from the class, the class provides several special features: objects can be declared as , shared among multiple objects, made read-only to improve performance, cloned, and made thread-safe. 如需有關所提供的不同功能物件，請參閱[Freezable 物件概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md)。For more information about the different features provided by objects, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md). ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

.method public hidebysig instance valuetype System.Windows.Media.DoubleCollection/Enumerator GetEnumerator() cil managed

summary.span: Returns an enumerator that can iterate through the collection.

span.span: Returns an enumerator that can iterate through the collection.

returns.span: An that can iterate through the collection.

span.span: An that can iterate through the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 列舉值只允許讀取集合中的資料。Enumerators only allow reading the data in the collection. 列舉值無法用於修改基礎集合。Enumerators cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 一開始，列舉程式位在集合中的第一個項目之前。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first item in the collection. 在這個位置上，呼叫擲回例外狀況。At this position, calling throws an exception. 因此，您必須呼叫將列舉值前進到再讀取的值集合的第一個項目。Therefore, you must call to advance the enumerator to the first item of the collection before reading the value of . 會傳回相同的物件直到呼叫 或 。 returns the same object until either or is called. 設定下一個項目。 sets to the next item. 集合的末端後，列舉程式會放置在集合中，最後一個項目之後和呼叫傳回`false`。After the end of the collection is passed, the enumerator is positioned after the last item in the collection, and calling returns `false`. 如果最後一個呼叫傳回`false`，則呼叫擲回例外狀況。If the last call to returned `false`, calling throws an exception. 若要設定集合一次的第一個項目，您可以呼叫後面。To set to the first item of the collection again, you can call followed by . 只要集合維持不變，列舉程式就持續有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果對集合進行變更，例如加入、 修改或刪除項目，列舉程式會永久失效，而且下次呼叫或會擲回。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying or deleting items, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and the next call to or throws an . 如果之間修改集合和，會傳回設定為時，項目，即使列舉值已經無效。If the collection is modified between and , will return the item that it is set to, even if the enumerator is already invalidated. 列舉程式沒有集合的獨佔存取權，因此，列舉集合內容本質上並不是安全的執行緒程序。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 即使集合經過同步化，其他執行緒仍然可以修改該集合，使列舉值擲回例外狀況。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads could still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要保證列舉過程的執行緒安全，您可以在整個列舉過程中鎖定集合，或攔截由其他執行緒的變更所造成的例外狀況。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.
